## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                 | Description                    |
| ------------------------------------ | ------------------------------ |
| `--ns-theme-drawer-background-color` | Color of the drawer background |
| `--ns-theme-drawer-border-color`     | Color of the drawer border     |
| `--ns-theme-drawer-width`            | Width of the drawer            |
